item.title: The high-profile Bitcoin whale who swapped ETH has sold 34,110 BTC over the past 11 days and bought 813,298.84 ETH.
item.description: On August 31st, according to the monitoring of @mlmabc, a highly prominent Bitcoin whale that has been rebalancing into ETH sold 7,000 BTC (approximately $7.59 billion) within the past 46 hours and purchased 171,791.84 ETH (approximately $7.73 billion). This whale still holds 3,000 BTC (about $3.25 billion) in the address beginning with 169qY, and it is likely that this will be rebalanced into ETH.Furthermore, the whale's wallet also contains 46,816 BTC (about $50.7 billion). Based on previous activities, another 14,495 BTC (about $15.7 billion) may be rebalanced into ETH. However, the remaining 32,321 BTC (about $35 billion) currently has an unknown movement. Overall, it seems that the whale intends to rebalance its entire holdings. This is mere speculation and not investment advice, and the true intentions of the whale remain unclear.As of now, in the past 11 days, the whale has sold 34,110 BTC (about $37 billion) and purchased 813,298.84 ETH (about $36.6 billion).

item.title: Analyst: Market in 'Recovery' Phase, Derivatives Market Skewed to the Sell Side
item.description: On August 31st, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. put forward that during the past week, the market has been in a "recovery" stage. Macroeconomic data and yields have suppressed risk appetite. Derivatives have shown a seller's market. And on-chain activity has remained neutral to weak. The Bitcoin price has been restrained to the lower Bollinger Band.

item.title: Binance: If the funding rate of a USDT-margined perpetual contract, settled hourly, remains at or below 0.002% for 36 consecutive funding intervals, it will revert to settlement every four hours.
item.description: August 31st. According to official channels, Binance announced that commencing from 08:00 on September 1, 2025 (UTC+8), in the event that the absolute value of the funding rate of the UUSD perpetual contract, which is settled every hour, remains lower than or equal to 0.002% for 36 consecutive periods, Binance Futures will adjust the funding rate settlement frequency back to every four hours starting from the 37th period.

item.title: A certain whale/institution transferred another 3 million FORM to Binance 10 minutes ago.
item.description: On August 31st, according to on-chain analyst Embermonitor, a particular whale/institution transferred an additional 3 million FORM ($9.87 million) to Binance just 10 minutes ago.Previously, the whale had made a deposit of 8 million FORM ($29.8 million) into the exchange the day before yesterday. During this period, FORM has experienced a 22% decline from 4:00 PM until now (from $4.04 to $3.14).

item.title: U.S. Trade Representative Tai: Moving Forward with Trade Negotiations Post-Tariff Ruling
item.description: On August 31, according to Fox News, Katherine Tai, the U.S. Trade Representative, stated that after a tariff ruling in a U.S. court, trade negotiations would continue. (Golden Ten)

item.title: Analysis: The WLFI TGE circulating supply is significantly lower than expected, with only 65.5% of the presale tokens transferred to the Lockbox contract for activation.
item.description: August 31st. According to on-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa), currently among the total 1 trillion WLFI token supply, only 20% of the explicitly unlocked tokens at TGE come from public sale rounds one and two. The total number of tokens from public sale rounds is 250 billion.· Assuming all participants have transferred their tokens to Lockbox and activated them, then the TGE circulating supply would be 5 billion tokens (5% of the total supply). Estimated at the current Binance contract price of $0.3858, this would result in a $1.93 billion sell-off.· However, Tokenomist discovered that in the WLFI smart contract, the corresponding early presale user share is only 1.843 million tokens (with 6.57 billion tokens not included). If this situation is true, then under the same conditions, the TGE circulating supply will be reduced to 3.68 billion tokens, with approximately a $1.42 billion sell-off.· As of eight o'clock tonight, the WLFI Lockbox contract has received a total of 16.395 bi

item.title: Binance Alpha has launched World of Dypians (WOD), and users holding at least 220 Alpha points can claim a 750 WOD airdrop.
item.description: August 31st, as per official channels, Binance Alpha has now initiated World of Dypians (WOD). Users possessing at least 220 Alpha points are eligible to claim an airdrop of 750 WOD tokens. The first-come, first-served principle applies. In case the event is not yet concluded, the points threshold will automatically reduce by 15 points every hour. It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha points. Users are required to confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: The high-profile BTC ancient whale has once again transferred 1000 BTC to Hyperliquid 20 minutes ago to reallocate into ETH.
item.description: On August 31st, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a highly prominent BTC ancient whale that has been actively swapping ETH recently transferred another 1000 BTC (valued at $108.54 million) to Hyperliquid for another round of ETH swapping, which occurred 20 minutes ago.During the past 8 hours, this whale has deposited a total of 3000 BTC, with a value of $326.78 million, and converted it into ETH.

item.title: Michael Saylor has reissued Bitcoin Tracker information, hinting at additional BTC purchases.
item.description: On August 31st, the founder of Strategy, Michael Saylor, once more shared information related to the Bitcoin Tracker. He declared, "Bitcoin is still available for purchase."Based on past patterns, Strategy always makes public information about increasing its holdings of Bitcoin on the second day following the release of such news.

item.title: Overall Open Interest of WLFI Futures Contracts Surges by 134.46% in 24 Hours, Currently Standing at $1.715 Billion
item.description: On August 31st, the cryptocurrency project of the Trump family, World Liberty Finance (WLFI) token, is set to officially go live tomorrow. In the past 24 hours, the overall trading volume of WLFI futures contracts surged by 134.46% and currently stands at 17.15 billion US dollars. The open interest has increased by 64.92% in the past 24 hours and is now at 7.93 billion US dollars.According to HTX market data, the pre-market price of WLFI (World Liberty Finance) briefly broke through $0.38 and is currently at $0.3781, with a 24-hour increase of more than 39.1%.World Liberty Finance (WLFI) is scheduled to go live on Ethereum on September 1st, with both claiming and trading enabled. Early supporters (at $0.015 and $0.05 rounds) will be able to unlock 20%, and the remaining 80% will be determined by community voting. Tokens held by the founding team, advisors, and partners will not be unlocked. Trading will start at 8 p.m. Beijing time on September 1st, with the start of claiming 20% of
